mapper.update: update exam set name=#{name}, subject_ids=#{subjectIds}, people=#{people}, date=#{date}, semester_number=#{semesterNumber}, is_show_grade_rank=#{isShowGradeRank}, is_show_class_rank=#{isShowClassRank}, note=#{note} where id=#{id}
mapper.sql: exam.id as id, exam.name as name, exam.subject_ids as subjectIds, exam.people as people, exam.date as date, exam.semester_number as semesterNumber, exam.is_show_grade_rank as isShowGradeRank, exam.is_show_class_rank as isShowClassRank, exam.note as note, exam.creation_date as creationDate
mapper.select: select , semester.name as semesterName from exam join semester on semester.number = exam.semester_number
select , semester.name as semesterName from exam join semester on semester.number = exam.semester_number order by exam.date desc limit 1
